description: This source file defines functions related to extracting and formatting version information from a given data structure, specifically for handling version info as a list or string and generating version strings.

methods.name: GetVersion(info)
methods.description: Extracts the version as a list of three integers (major, minor, patch) from the input dictionary, supporting input formats as a list or string, and applies defaults if missing.

methods.name: GetVersionString(info)
methods.description: Returns the version as a dot-separated string by utilizing the GetVersion function.
